channel.title: Buffing the do-nothing tactic
channel.description:
Sometimes a killer will do nothing for a night or more in order to frame the King or a jailed person, or to counter a Drunk deb. But I've been outed before by an Observer who pointed out I didn't visit anyone. And I just busted someone who had impossible logs because, having done nothing that night, he was unaware that he had been debauched.
And I felt he hadn't deserved to be outed like that. So could we make do-nothings be notified of redirects and actually visit the drunk?

item.title: Buffing the do-nothing tactic
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
This is pretty necessary tbh

Read full topic

item.title: Buffing the do-nothing tactic
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
Night actions don’t resolve till the end of the night so i dont think this harms mystic’s in any way

Read full topic

item.title: Buffing the do-nothing tactic
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Exactly!

Let’s make the mystic visit the drunk

Read full topic
